title: RIOT ARE YOU LOOKING FOR STUFF?
body:
I'm an graphic designer and at the moment i live at london, i would ask you if are you looking for stuff look like designer for artworks, illustration or logo! :D 
I did {{sticker:sg-jinx}} ever wish to work for League of Legends

replies.body: Check our job boards!  We usually have openings all around the world for both contracted and full-time work.
Where can i found it? i need more indication

Since Riot removed the comment where I sent you the link you asked for, I took the time to make a little tutorial for you {{sticker:poppy-wink}} 

[There you go](https://imgur.com/a/RQQ4u4V)
The mods removed it, not Riot, because you were being extremely rude for no reason.

Yes, you are right, I am sorry. It was a mod, not a riot employee.
And to me being rude...
I used a little something called sarcasm to motivate someone to use their brain or, in the case of most people on the internet, google (due to a lack of the former). 

Have a great evening.

Hello there :)

I would like to ask a question, if Its not a problem. Could you please try to find out something about EU (EUNE) Rioters or event? I'm asking randomly under comments from you guys since I have no other way of contacting you, sorry if I'm rude but I'm more of a desperate {{sticker:sg-lulu}} 

No one on EU forums is answering us and we all would really love to participate in such an event. Its a 10th anniversary for all of us after all :) We love league in Europe as well.
So please, if there is any info, or if someone from NA Riot team could play on some EU accounts it would be awesome! Thank for any response :)

Happy anniversary !
